entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is introduced as a person who gestures Narcissa to the sofa. He is described as someone who is usually inhabited by an air of neglect.

entities.name: narcissa
entities.description: Narcissa is introduced as a person who throws off her cloak and sits down on the sofa. She is described as having white and trembling hands clasped in her lap.

entities.name: bellatrix
entities.description: Bellatrix is introduced as a person with heavily lidded eyes and a strong jaw. She does not take her gaze from Snape as she moves to stand behind Narcissa.

entities.name: wormtail
entities.description: Wormtail is mentioned as someone who is present in the room but is referred to as vermin by Snape.

relationships.description: Snape gestures Narcissa to the sofa.
Bellatrix does not take her gaze from Snape as she moves to stand behind Narcissa.
Narcissa and Wormtail are present in the same room.
